name: Cracked.ai
tagline: Scale Your Product with AI Influencers
description: Cracked AI lets you launch AI influencer agents that comment, post, and reply across social media like real creators. Build agents with custom personalities, automate engagement at scale, and grow your audience with no technical skills required. Each action is optimized for reach, conversions, or follower growth. Whether you are a brand, agency, or creator, Cracked AI helps you scale influence through always on digital agents that never stop working.

name: Hero Widget
tagline: Real-time mrr & user count tracking
description: Hero Widget - Beautiful embeddable widget for displaying MRR and user count metrics in real-time. Easy to integrate with a simple code snippet.

name: Suprr
tagline: Customer support directly from Telegram
description: An easy to install customer support bubble for your website that sends customer conversations to your Telegram. Tailored to small teams, respond to your customers‚Äô requests right from Telegram, 5 min to integrate

name: Double Tap
tagline: Remap your shortcuts with a double tap
description: Turn any shortcut into a Double Tap trigger

name: Always-on Meeting AI by SuperIntern
tagline: Live Notes & Translation for Every Meeting ‚Äî No Bot Needed
description: SuperIntern is an always-on AI meeting copilot that turns live conversations into output. It auto-generates structured summaries that automatically organize action items and timelines, and surfaces context mid-call to keep decisions moving. It learns your team‚Äôs jargon, supports 50+ languages, and we‚Äôre building toward automating more workflows that start from conversation. Try it free on your next few meetings.

name: Motionik
tagline: Beautiful screen recordings for Windows & macOS
description: Motionik is a screen recorder with a built-in editor for creating engaging product demos, tutorials and explainer videos. Its core feature: auto zoom with smart cursor tracking and customizable backgrounds - naturally focused without needing manual editing

name: tsk.lol
tagline: a customizable, open source, local-first, task manager
description: tsk is a personal task manager i started building for myself with a friend. finally decided to finish and publish it - free and open source for anyone to use. the goal of tsk is to show you a holistic view of your day - not just meetings, but tasks, focus blocks, activities, and screen time. it's also local-first, so everything is instant, works offline, and syncs across devices. check it out and tsk.lol - would love to hear your feedback!

name: Mureka O2
tagline: Turn ideas into music, faster and in higher quality
description: Mureka introduces two upgraded music engines. O2 is the flagship model for premium, expressive sound suitable for ads and films. V7.6 is built for high efficiency, stability, and speed, ideal for mobile creation and real-time scoring.

name: Kanaji
tagline: Learn Japanese Kanji
description: A simple iOS app to learn and practice writing Kanji

name: ModelPilot
tagline: Optimize Performance, Cost, Speed & Carbon for each prompt
description: ModelPilot is an intelligent LLM router that automatically picks the best AI model for each prompt, balancing cost, latency, quality, and environmental impact. Unlike other tools, it‚Äôs a drop-in API replacement for OpenAI-style endpoints, meaning you can integrate it in minutes without changing your existing code.

name: My Clocks
tagline: Personalized world clocks in your menu bar
description: Add personalized clocks for different timezones and have them sync between all your Apple devices!

name: TaskHz
tagline: Cognitive prosthetic for attention
description: TaskHz helps you get in the zone and stay there by blending focus-boosting binaural beats with gentle ambient sound so you can work deeply, stay calm, and protect your focus from noise.

name: ActFlux
tagline: Turn Every Meeting Into Action, Automatically
description: Today we‚Äôre launching ActFlux, an AI-powered tool that instantly transforms your meeting recordings into clear action items, owners, deadlines, decisions, and task boards ‚Äî all in seconds. No bots joining your calls. No messy notes. No ‚ÄúWho‚Äôs doing what again?‚Äù meetings. Just upload ‚Üí review ‚Üí act. ‚ö°

name: AppPad
tagline: Implement Launchpad on macOS 26
description: Apple removed Launchpad in macOS 26. Those accustomed to Launchpad found it very disconcerting, so AppPad emerged to fill the void left by Launchpad and help users rediscover the familiar feel.

name: blocks.so
tagline: Open-source UI library built with React, Tailwind and shadcn
description: Free shadcn/ui blocks and components built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Next.js. Copy and paste 60+ beautifully designed, accessible UI blocks into your projects. Open source forever.

name: Velocity: Prompt Co-Pilot Lite
tagline: Grammarly For Prompting - Personalised with Unified Memory!
description: Imagine Grammarly for prompting, but on steroids! Its your personalised context layer that turns your thoughts into optimised, AI-ready prompts in one click. AI is only as good as the prompts you give it, Velocity makes sure they're great consistently! Make the most of AIs even on the free plan by prompt maxxing effortlessly! Stop wasting time, unlock precise results, instantly. Perfect for power users that use AI tools, professionals & creators to boost productivity up to 80% seamlessly!

name: Untyped
tagline: The AI agent for Gmail & Outlook that DOES work
description: Win back hours a day with the most flexible AI agent for Gmail and Outlook. Trained on your entire email history and running inside your inbox in one click. Main features: - Drafts reply in your tone - AI auto-categorization for better organization - Keeps improving and learning on your feedback - Custom knowledgebase for fine-grained context engineering Start your 7-day free trial today üöÄ

name: Carousify
tagline: All-in-One Linkedin Growth Platform
description: Join hundreds of LinkedIn creators using Carousify. Create carousels, organize your content, and grow your brand across multiple LinkedIn profiles and pages.

name: Mediasaur
tagline: Sell faster with AI UGC
description: Mediasaur puts AI right inside your media library. Generate UGC shots, product photo variants, lifestyle images, and ad-ready assets directly from the files you already store. No exporting, downloading, or re-uploading. Outputs land instantly in your folders, already hosted, optimized, and ready to drop into your site or campaigns. AI becomes part of your workflow‚Äînot a separate tool.

name: FeatureShark
tagline: Customer feedback & product management without the chaos
description: FeatureShark collects feedback from every channel, kills duplicates automatically, lets users upvote what matters most (just like Productboard or Canny) and lets you prioritize with real frameworks like RICE, Kano, WSJF, Value vs Effort. Two-way sync with Slack, Jira, GitHub, Linear, Monday.com, and more coming. One lightweight widget gives your users feedback submission, live chat, surveys, and a help center. No more spreadsheet chaos or endless debates. Just clarity on what to build next.
